document_data.title: Dragon's Honor
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Dragon's Honor''''' is a one-round tournament adventure module set in the [[Living City]] organized play program, Part IV of the ''[[Cycle of Dragons]]'' series. It was published in 2000 for the 2{{nd}} edition, and is intended for adventurers of all levels.

{{quote|''From Waterdeep the prophecy drives you to Westgate where the third key to the puzzle might be. Once there you find that that politics are not all they are cracked up to be. Especially when you find yourself caught in the middle of a conflict that you did not start. In order to succeed however, you and a new found friend must put a stop to it... This is a 2 Time Unit event. Part 4 in the Cycle of Dragons Series.''}}
